LanguageData.Cinfusion.label: infusion
LanguageData.Cinfusion.description: Psychically stimulates the target's mental activity.
LanguageData.Ccrystalskin.label: deflection
LanguageData.Ccrystalskin.description: Creates a semi-ethereal layer of flexible crystal on the surface of the target, increasing its armor
LanguageData.Cexsanguinate.label: exsanguinate
LanguageData.Cexsanguinate.description: Causes existing wounds on a body to bleed at a much higher rate.
LanguageData.Ctourniquet.label: tourniquet
LanguageData.Ctourniquet.description: Psychically siphons pressure around a target's limbs to substantially slow bleeding, at the cost of manipulation. Useful to spare a creature from bleeding out.
LanguageData.Cblast.label: psionic blast
LanguageData.Cblast.description: Generates a skipgate that siphons psionic energy at a point, causing a small explosion
LanguageData.CRegeneration.label: regeneration
LanguageData.CRegeneration.description: Almost negates bleeding, reduces pain, and bestows extreme healing capabilities on target pawn for a long time. Chance to heal permanent wounds over time.
LanguageData.CbigBlast.label: concentrated blast
LanguageData.CbigBlast.description: Generates a skipgate that siphons an extremely dense concentration of psionic energy at a point, causing a powerful explosion
LanguageData.Cwither.label: wither
LanguageData.Cwither.description: Places extreme stress on target's body, causing a variety of negative effects.
